relevance_explanation: The routine only includes steps relevant to the customer, based on their data. The routine correctly skips steps related to suspended accounts, zero balances, financial assistance checks(urgency=high), and late fee waivers (customer not eligible). It also correctly utilizes the digital wallet payment method based on the customer data.
completeness_explanation: The trimmed routine preserves all the necessary logic, tools, and branches that apply to this customer. All required steps for handling the outstanding balance, high urgency payment, preferred currency, digital wallet payment processing, sending receipt, offering a payment plan and finalizing the interaction are present.
